title: Deutsche Bank ranked Number 1 for Financing in Asia Pacific for Q1 2023
body:
Deutsche Bank has once again solidified its position as a financing powerhouse, ranking Number 1 in Asia Pacific for Financing in Q1 2023, according to Coalition*. It was also ranked Number 1 for financing in the specific regions of Japan, Asia, and the Pacific.
Deutsche Bank maintained the top position in financing regionally, capturing a significant share across its peer set. This ranking reflects the bank’s best-in-class approach to risk management over many years and the business growth achieved across all of Asia Pacific. This has been driven by increased collaboration across the bank, greater share of financial sponsors business, expansion of the corporate client base and demonstrating leadership in providing ESG financing solutions.
Our continued focus on maintaining a client-centric approach in conjunction with our innovation and full set of credit solutions has helped drive our momentum in the financing space. We are proud of our ability to support our clients with groundbreaking solutions during what have been challenging market conditions.
Amit Khattar, Head of Investment Bank and Co-Head of Global Financing & Credit Trading for Asia Pacific.
*Coalition Greenwich Competitor Analytics: analysis based upon Deutsche Bank taxonomy and internal revenues in the Coalition Index of the 12 largest global investment banks.
